card.name: SW - Bridging deal not able to assign to attorney

data.text: @gillianoberholzer no, I don't do the search on the website.... otherwise we will incur costs for anyone messing on the site. We are supposed to Decline those matters on our side. We've never had a Property Not Found being submitted to Bridging from EA side... this is a first. I will simply let it go through to Cheslyn so she can decline it with reason.
